TextView.android:text:
This application will help you navigate through different companies' IVR phone systems.
To find a company, please click 'List of all companies we support'.
Once you've found a company, click their listing. You will be presented with a menu of options. Choose the option that you want to follow, and continue until you've reached a button that will begin your call.
Once you've done some searches, you can retrace them using 'Recent searches' on the home screen.
You can also save searches by holding the 'Begin Call' button, and find them under 'Favorite searches' later.
